name: Progton Technologies
description:
We are Progton Technologies - a software services and technology consulting firm with expertise in web and mobile application development. With 10+ years of hands-on experience in Ruby On Rails and Python-Django for backend development; AngularJS, React for the frontend development using Agile Methodologies and with a team of 30+ experienced developers we ensure in delivering world class applications to our customers and partners. 
We have over 100+ projects developed and delivered successfully in Ruby on Rails, Angular, React and React Native that showcases our expertise in the technology stack.
Our customer first approach makes us stand out of the crowd.
Check out our amazing works:
https://www.knowde.comhttps://talocity.inhttps://www.mindswarms.com/
